changePINDesc: Changing the PIN will require you to be signed-out of the application, and thus you will have to sign in again. Are you ready to continue?
signOutDesc: You are about to exit the application. The next time you want to enter the application, you will need to sign-in. Are you ready to continue?
businessNameBeingProfileNameError: Please make sure a business name isn't just a combination of your first and last names
invalidPhoneNumberError: Please make sure you have entered the correct phone number
